item.title: Stock Futures Edge Higher as Chip Stocks Lead Gains
item.description: U.S. stock futures climbed as global chip stocks rallied on the back of strong earnings from a key assembler of Nvidia and Apple products.

item.title: Canadian Dollar Rises After Reports PM Trudeau Could Resign
item.description: The Canadian dollar rose following media reports that Prime Minister Justin Trudeau could announce that he will resign, potentially as early as Monday...

item.title: Jefferies Favors Buying German 10-Year Bunds at Current Levels
item.description: The yield on 10-year Bunds edged up and Jefferies said it had a buy level at 2.40%, so would prefer “a long position at [the] current level.”

item.title: Gold Futures Drop Ahead of U.S. Data But Early 2025 Outlook Is Robust
item.description: Gold futures slid as investors position themselves ahead of U.S. economic data, with Friday’s jobs report expected to shed further light on the Fed’s ...

item.title: Europe's Gas Price Slips But Remains Supported by Cold Weather, Supply Worries
item.description: European natural-gas prices fell in early trade but remain elevated on the month due to colder weather forecasts and supply concerns following the sus...
